general.gigTitle: be full stack web developer software developer PHP laravel html react nodejs

sellerCard.oneLiner: Full Stack Developer : PHP, Laravel, Nodejs, Reactjs, Nextjs, more
sellerCard.description: Hi! I am self motivated professional full-stack web developer with 5+ years of experience and good work ethic and productive self-starter. I am proficient in various technologies, including PHP, Laravel, Nodejs, React, Vue, Nextjs, and CSS. With years of experience building complex web applications, I have a deep understanding of both frontend and backend development. I can make cool and new websites for you that work really well.  Let's build something extraordinary together!

description.content:
Are you looking for an experienced full-stack web developer to take your business to the next level and exceed your expectations? I can provide the best solution that is both functional and user-friendly.


As a full-stack web and software developer, I use the latest technologies and development methodologies to ensure your website or software is reliable, scalable, and secure.


I will help you create an innovative website, web app, or custom software to make a massive difference in your business success. I will work to bring your idea to life with a well-structured development model.


Technical Skills:


Languages: PHP, JavaScript, Python, PL/SQL

Web Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node, TypeScript

Frameworks: Laravel, Angular, React, Bootstrap, jQuery, React Native, Ionic

Databases: MySQL, MongoDB


Services I Provide:


  • Complete Website Development  
  • Custom Web Application Development  
  • Software Development
  • Front-End and Back-End Development
  • Responsive and user-friendly design
  • Responsive Web Design  
  • Maintenance and Support
  • Testing and Quality Assurance


Ready to move forward? Contact me to discuss your project requirements and get a customized quote.

slide.name: be full stack web developer software developer PHP laravel html react nodejs
be full stack web developer software developer PHP laravel html react nodejs

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you convert Figma designs to React?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you can share your Figma design and I can develop it into a pixel perfect, responsive, React website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you ensure the scalability and performance of your applications?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I implement efficient code practices, proper database indexing, and other optimization techniques to ensure scalability and performance.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you handle bugs or issues that come up during development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I use debugging tools and conduct comprehensive testing to detect and resolve bugs. If any issues arise after the delivery, I promptly address them in accordance with our agreed terms.

packageList.title: Single Page Web Application
packageList.description: One Page Static Design + Development or Figma to Reactjs, Nextjs, Clean Code

packageList.title: Small Web Application
packageList.description: 5 Pages Static Design + Development or Figma to React, Nextjs, SSR, Clean Code

packageList.title: Premium Web Application
packageList.description: Interactive 8 Page Design & Development + Redux + Provided API Integration + Basic Functionality

reviews.comment:
I probably had the longest order, and we’re not even finished yet. But from the very first delivery, despite my many requests for changes from time to time, they never gave up on me. They always supported me until the end.

To you reading this comment: if you're looking for experienced, patient, and understanding people, know that you’re in the right place and in good hands.

Thank you, Torikul, Mahim, Solaiman, and everyone else!

seller_response.comment: I’m grateful for the smooth collaboration and your trust in my abilities. Looking forward to the next opportunity!

reviews.comment:
We couldn’t be happier with the website that they built for us. From start to finish, they exceeded our expectations in every way. The design is clean, the functionality is seamless,  They took our vision and turned it into something even better than we imagined.

Not only did they do a wonderful job, but they were also professional, responsive, and detail-oriented throughout the entire process. We highly recommend  to anyone looking for top-notch web development.

Thank you for your incredible work!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words! I’m truly grateful for the opportunity to work with you on this project. It’s incredibly rewarding to know that I was able to bring your vision to life and exceed your expectations.

reviews.comment: Torikul provided an excellent customer service and professionalism of work. Very happy with what he delivered and the website he built out for me and my client. Would be recommending his services and using him for future projects.

seller_response.comment: I sincerely value your feedback and trust. Hoping to assist you with more projects in the future.

reviews.comment: He performed excellently in finishing the website changes I requested. The task was completed rapidly, and he sought out methods to turn my ideas into reality. I would endorse him for his programming skills and the great value he provides for my investment.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for trusting me with your project. Your professionalism made this experience seamless.

reviews.comment: A highly skilled and professional website developer! he worked quickly and delivered an exceptional website that exceeded my expectations. Highly recommended!
